ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry the post is so long, I was a bit bored. * Iron Raptor sighed as she felt solid ground under her feet, then looking around but not knowing where Prowl had

Subject: Re: Returning to the CF
From: Iron Raptor <ironraptor13@...>

         Sorry the post is so long, I was a bit bored.

* Iron Raptor sighed as she felt solid ground under her feet, then looking around but not knowing where Prowl had taken her to.
She had thought that they were going back to the Ark, not to some other ship.
Her expression was puzzled as she looked over the battle ship, a thousand questions running through her mind.
But then she gave an exhausted sigh; there would be enough time for questions later. Now was time for repair and rest, for both of them.
Though, she knew that she could nearly faint with relief. Glad as the Matrix to be away from such an awful place as the Alliance and back into the welcoming arms she loved so much, Prowls.
Iron Raptor listened to him speak: Their new base?
Her optics looked over the huge base with excited wonder, just dreaming of what sort of weapons if held in its Holds, what power it had.
A smile creeping across her lips as she listened to Prowl explain how well the shields had held, thinking of just how this ship could increase their chances of winning the Beast Wars!
Iron Raptor then looked back towards Prowl as he slipped his arm around her waist, also enjoying the feel of him against her.
She noticed his damage but knew that he could take care of it, after all, he WAS a Transmetal 2�with his own built-in instant repair system. Though, still a bit concerned.
Looking into Prowls eyes as he looked into hers she relaxed a bit more, knowing that she was safe from anything as long as she was with him. Her own love for him showing in the depths of her own optics.
Hearing him explain where she would be bunked and a little tinge of excitement and surprise felt when he explained that it would be HIS quarters she would be staying in, then a little disappointment when she heard him say that he would find another place to sleep while she stayed in her room.
She obeyed his tugging as he walked towards the Cybertronien Fire, both of them soon to enter their new home.
Iron Raptor slightly leaned against Prowl and feeling his warmth.*

� Who ever said you had to find somewhere else to sleep?�

* She asked while she grinned and gave him a sly glance, tightening her hold on his waist for a moment but then relaxing her grip. Half joking but half not. Loving the idea of having him so close in her sleeping hours as well as her waking.
But then Prowl asked her if she needed a CR chamber and she nodded, knowing  how damaged she really was. There was no point in hiding it , mainly because it couldn�t be hid.
Iron Raptor let out a breath just before she spoke.*

� Yeah. But it seems to me that a certain knight in shining armor needs a little R &R himself, having rescued a damsel in distress and all.�

* She smiled at him. Actually proud of him and what he had done, though, expecting no less from the bot she loved and would do the same for.*
